intro_01: Welcome, detective! <break time=".5s"/> I know you can hear me, but you can't see me, <break time="400ms"/>  That's because I'm hiding somewhere in this kitchen. To find me, you can ask me questions about where I'm hiding.
intro_02: The circle on the right shows how many questions you have left.  As you can see, you have ten chances to find me. Let's try the first question together.
The circle on the right shows that you have ten questions to find me. Let's go ahead and try the first question together.
intro_03: Okay. First. Try asking if I'm hiding somewhere yellow.
intro_03_fallback: That's a great question, but I really would like you to ask me if I'm hidden in a yellow hiding spot.
intro_yellow: Yes. I could be in the yellow cupboard, <break time=".3s"/> the yellow jar, <break time=".3s"/> or behind the yellow bowls. <break time=".5s"/> Now, go ahead and guess where I'm hidden!
intro_yellow_fallback: Try asking me if i'm in the yellow jar or behind the yellow bowls.

jar: Yay! You found me! I was hiding in the jar. Great work, detective!
Nice! You found me! It looks like we have a true detective here!
cupboard: Nope. I'm not in the cupboard. But that would've been a great hiding spot! <break time=".5"/> Okay, go ahead and guess again.
Nope, not in the cupboard! Now, you can ask me another question, or just guess where I'm hiding. Okay, go ahead.
bowls: Nope. I'm not behind the bowls. <break time=".5"/> Okay, go ahead and guess again.
Nope, I'm not behind the bowls. Great guess, though! <break time = ".5s"/> Okay, ask me another question.

intro_nofind: You didn't find me this time. But that's okay!
I guess I found a pretty good hiding spot! Better luck next time!
intro_revisit: Welcome back! Am I still playing with <%= userName %>?
Hi again! Is that you, <%= userName %>?
intro_revisit_fallback: Sorry, I couldnâ€™t get that, are you <%= userName %>?
intro_revisit_player_check: So. Who do we have today? Are you <%= userName1 %> <%= userName2 ? ', <break time=".3s"/>' + userName2 : '' %>, <break time=".3s"/> or a new player.
intro_revisit_player_check_fallback: Sorry, I was distracted, did you say you're a new player or are you <%= userName1 %> <%= userName2 ? 'or ' + userName2 : '' %>
name_color_question: Okay, let's give you a nickname before we start playing. First, what's your favorite color?
Okay, let's give you a nickname before we start playing. Let's see... What's your favorite color in the whole world?
name_color_reply: I love the color <%= scope %>! Next, if you could be ANY of these animals, what would it be: a <%= arg1 %>, a <%= arg2 %>, or a <%= arg3 %>?

Great choice! <%= scope %> is the color of the oven I was baked in. I wonder if we have anything else in common. Now, which of these animals is your favorite: a <%= arg1 %>, a <%= arg2 %> or a <%= arg3 %>?
name_animal_reply: Nice! Let's see. I think I'll call you Detective <%= color %> <%= animal %>.
Perfect. I think I'll call you Detective <%= color %> <%= animal %>!
name_color_exception: Try a color like <%= arg1 %>, <%= arg2 %>, or <%= arg3 %>. Which one do you like.
You can pick a color like <%= arg1 %>, <%= arg2 %>, or <%= arg3 %>. Which one do you like.
name_animal_exception: Try an animal like <%= arg1 %>, a <%= arg2 %>, or even a <%= arg3 %>. Which one do you like.
You can pick an animal like <%= arg1 %>, a <%= arg2 %>, or a <%= arg3 %>! Which would you like.
start_intro: So, which level do you want to play?
start_locked_level: Sorry. <%= level %> isn't ready yet. <break time = ".5s"/> Try playing the level before it first.
It looks like <%= level %> isn't ready yet. Try playing the level before it first.
start_fallback: I didn't catch that. <break time = ".5s"/> What level do you want to play?
hiding_method_1: I can hide in the kitchen, or you can have someone else hide me. Which one do you want.
First things first. Do you want me to hide myself, or would you like someone else to hide me.
hiding_method_1_fallback: Please let me know if you want me to hide or if someone else should hide me.
hiding_method_self: Okay. Don't peek! <break time=".5s"/> I'll turn off the <%= kitchen %> kitchen lights just in case.
Okay. I'll turn off the <%= kitchen %> kitchen lights before I hide. And here I go!
hiding_method_manual_1: Okay. I'm ready to be hidden! And, <%= userName %>, make sure you close your eyes!
hiding_method_manual_2: Okay, now it's your turn to hide me. Pick a spot. But don't let <%= userName %> see!
Go ahead and pick a spot to hide me in. And make sure <%= userName %> doesn't peek!
gameloop_explanation: Okay, Detective? You can ask up to 10 yes or no questions, to find my hiding spot, as fast as you can.
gameloop_exceptions: I missed that. You can ask me something about my hiding spot like: "<%= question %>?" Okay, go ahead!
I didn't catch that. You can ask me something like: "<%= question %>?" Okay, go ahead!
gameloop_intro_1: Okay. I'm hidden somewhere in this kitchen. And you can ask me up to ten questions about my hiding spot. So go ahead and ask your first question.
Okay, all set. Now, you can ask me a question about where I'm hiding. So, what's your first question?

color: Yes. I'm hiding in a <%= arg %> place.
I AM hiding in a <%= arg %> spot.
temperature: Why yes. It IS pretty <%= arg %>  in here!
Yes. It is quite <%= arg %>  in here.
size: Yes. My hiding spot is quite <%= arg %> .
Getting warmer. My hiding spot is pretty <%= arg %> .
dark: Yes, it's pretty dark in here. I hope you find me soon!
Yes, it's pretty dark. Wait, let me open my eyes. Okay, it's still dark.

color: Nope. I'm not hiding in a <%= arg %> place.
Negative. My hiding spot isn't <%= arg %> .
temperature: Nope. Not very <%= arg %> in here at all.
Negative. It's not that <%= arg %> in here.
dark: Nope. it's not very dark at all.
Let me look around. No, it's not very dark in here.

gameloop_hidingspot_true: You did it! Detective <%= userName %>? You found me! Now, get on your feet and we'll celebrate with a little cookie dance!

fridge: Nope, I'm not inside the fridge
bowls: Nope, I'm not behind the bowls
plates: Nope, I'm not behind the plates
cups: Nope, I'm not behind the cups
carrots: Nope, I'm not behind the carrots
dish towel: Nope, I'm not behind the dish towel

win_dance_intro: Let's do the cookie dance! Just follow my lead, in THREE...  TWO... ONE... Let's go! And... that's... the... way... the... cookie... crumbles!
Okay, just do what I do. Ready in ONE... TWO... THREE... We're doing the cookie dance. It is the best dance. I think we're best friends.
win_score_calculation_seconds: Looks like you <%= questionsLeft > 0 ? 'still' : '' %> had <%= questionsLeft %> <%= questionsLeft > 1 ? 'questions' : 'question' %> left, and it only took you <%= seconds %> seconds to find me. That gives you a total of <%= score %> points.
win_score_calculation_minutes: Looks like you <%= questionsLeft > 0 ? 'still' : '' %> had <%= questionsLeft %> <%= questionsLeft > 1 ? 'questions' : 'question' %> left, and it took you <%= minutes %> minutes <%= seconds > 0 ? 'and ' + seconds + 'seconds' : '' %> to find me. That gives you a total of <%= score %> points.
win_new_highscore: Look at you! That's a new high score!
level_unlocked_intro: Good news! You unlocked a new kitchen. Want to check it out?
Looks like someone's ready for the next kitchen! Want to check it out?
level_unlocked_intro_fallback: That new kitchen looks amazing! Do you want to check it out?
level_unlocked_proceed: I was hoping you'd say that. Let's go!

game_lose_intro: Oh no, it looks like this mouse found me first! Better luck next time, detective?
game_lose_try_again: So, do you want to try again?
game_lose_try_again_fallback: I'm sure you can do it! Do you want to try again?
game_end_what_to_do: What do you want to do?
game_end_what_to_do_fallback: An interesting option, but do you want to try again or go to a different level?

deviceNotSupported: Hi, please play this game on a smart display.

introduction.questionInstructionText: You can ask me up to 10 questions.
introduction.colorQuestion: Ask me if I'm hiding somewhere yellow.
introduction.hidingSpotQuestion: Ask me more about my Hiding spot.

time.description: Find me as fast as you can
